text: African-American Muslims are African Americans who practice the Muslim faith. Most black Muslims are converts who converted from other religions such as Christianity. 2% of African Americans are Muslims in the United States. https://www.pewresearch.org/short-reads/2019/01/17/black-muslims-account-for- a-fifth-of-all-u-s-muslims-and-about-half-are-converts-to-islam/ ==References== Category:African-American people Category:Islam in the United States
title: African-American Muslims
